评论详情: The choker itself is good for the price, but the extension clip doesn't secure the loose end. This is fine if you're using the full length, but problematic if you just needed a small extension like me.  The extension clip holds up for photos and the like, but for an all day outfit you'll have to constantly adjust it or accept that it will look crooked (it looks very silly while crooked).

Being that it has transgender colors, you would expect it to be sized for necks that got testosterone either as part of their first or second puberty. No, this is sized for children or an AFAB pre-HRT.  Not usable by transgender individuals.
